languages.text:
This creature switches {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. It becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of suffering the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect, becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect instead of psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.
Also, the creature is immune to falling {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Существо заменяет {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g}. Вместо {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g} или неспособности атаковать оно получает {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}, вместо {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g}, а вместо психосоматической {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмы{/g} — эффект {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}пси-подавление{/g}.
Также существо получает иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидыванию{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
This creature switches negative effects. It becomes staggered instead of suffering the stunned or cannot attack effect, becomes slowed instead of immobilised, shocked instead of concussed, and suffers the calmed warp effect instead of psychosomatic trauma.
Also, the creature is immune to falling prone.

This creature switches negative effects. It becomes staggered instead of suffering the stunned or cannot attack effect, becomes slowed instead of immobilised, shocked instead of concussed, and suffers the calmed warp effect instead of psychosomatic trauma.
Also, the creature is immune to falling prone.

This creature switches {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. It becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of suffering the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect, becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect instead of psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.
Also, the creature is immune to falling {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

languages.text:
Esta criatura altera los {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g}. Queda {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrada{/g} en vez de quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdida{/g} o sufrir el efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g}, queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizada{/g} en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizada{/g} y sufre {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}amortiguación psíquica{/g} en vez de traumatismo psicosomático.{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}{/g}
La criatura tampoco puede quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribada{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Esta criatura altera los {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efectos negativos{/g}. Queda {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrada{/g} en vez de quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdida{/g} o sufrir un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} que no permite atacar, queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizada{/g} en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizada{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ShockedEffect}conmocionada{/g} en vez de traumatizada y sufre {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}disformidad en calma{/g} en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} psicosomática.
La criatura tampoco puede quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribada{/g}.

languages.text:
此生物承受的{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}会被较轻的效果替代。当此生物被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或陷入{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}状态时，只会承受{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}效果，被{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}时只会承受{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}效果，受到精神{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}时只会承受{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}灵能抑制{/g}效果影响。
此外，此生物不会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。

traits.locale_text:
此生物承受的{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}会被较轻的效果替代。当此生物被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或受到无法攻击{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响时，只会受到{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}效果影响，被{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}时只会受到{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}效果影响，陷入休克时只会受到{g|Encyclopedia:ShockedEffect}电击{/g}效果影响，受到精神{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}时只会承受轻微的{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}亚空间{/g}效果影响。
此外，此生物不会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态。

此生物承受的{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}会被较轻的效果替代。当此生物被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或陷入{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}状态时，只会承受{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，被{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}时只会承受{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}效果，受到精神{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}时只会承受灵能抑制效果影响。
此外，此生物不会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。

languages.text:
Diese Kreatur wechselt {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekte{/g}. Es fängt an zu {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumeln{/g}, anstatt mit {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäuben{/g} oder dem Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Angriff unmöglich{/g} belegt zu werden. Es wird auch nur {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}, anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden und erleidet den Effekt "{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Psi-Dämpfung{/g}" anstelle eines psychosomatischen {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumas{/g}.
Darüber hinaus ist die Kreatur immun gegen , {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hinstrecken{/g}.

This creature switches {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. It becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of suffering the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect, becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect instead of psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.
Also, the creature is immune to falling {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Diese Kreatur wechselt {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative Effekte{/g}. Es fängt zu {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumeln{/g} an, anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden oder gar {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Angriff unmöglich{/g} zu erleiden. Es wird auch nur {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}, anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ShockedEffect}geschockt{/g} anstatt erschüttert. Außerdem erleidet es den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Beruhigtes Warp{/g} anstatt eines {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}psychosomatischen Traumas{/g}.
Darüber hinaus ist die Kreatur immun dagegen, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} zu werden.

languages.text:
Cette créature échange les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g}. Elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} au lieu des effets {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Attaque impossible{/g}. Elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} au lieu de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Affaiblissement psy{/g} au lieu de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumatisme{/g} psychosomatique.
En outre, elle est invulnérable à toute forme de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This creature switches {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}. It becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of suffering the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect, becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, and suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect instead of psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.
Also, the creature is immune to falling {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cette créature échange les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effets négatifs{/g}. Elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} au lieu de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} ou ne peut pas attaquer l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}. Elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} au lieu de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ShockedEffect}Choc{/g} au lieu de l'effet Concussion, et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Warp Apaisé{/g} au lieu de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumatisme{/g} Psychosomatique.
En outre, elle est invulnérable à toute forme de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysie{/g}.

languages.text:
この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}ネガティブ効果{/g}を変換する。{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}もしくは{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃不可{/g}効果は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}に、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}に、そして心因的{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}は超能力減衰になる。
さらに、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}への耐性を得る。

traits.locale_text:
この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}ネガティブ効果{/g}を変換する。{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}もしくは攻撃不可{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}に、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}に、意識障害は{g|Encyclopedia:ShockedEffect}ショック{/g}に、心因的{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}鎮められた<歪み>{/g}になる。
さらに、この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}への耐性を得る。

Существо заменяет {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g}. Вместо {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g} или неспособности атаковать оно получает {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}, вместо {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g}, а вместо психосоматической {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмы{/g} — эффект {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}пси-подавление{/g}.
Также существо получает иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидыванию{/g}.

languages.text:
Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkileri{/g} birbiriyle değiştirir. {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Sersemlemek{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}saldıramaz{/g} hâle gelmek yerine {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallar{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Felç{/g} olmak yerine {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g} ve ruhsezi {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travması{/g} geçirmek yerine {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}ruhsezi körelmesine{/g} uğrar.
Ayrıca yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilmeye{/g} karşı bağışıklık kazanır.
